page.title: 17A STOTTESDON MOTHER'S A.M.
page.content: {My name is Pam;}I am 38, with two children aged 18mths. & 7yrs. My husband is a manager in a medium sized engineering firm on the outskirts of Birmingham 45mins car journey away. My house is detached in 1/4 acre. My Wednesday <like every other day> starts at 7.15 with a shower and breakfast. My{husband leaves the house at 7.30. I turn on Radio 4 & prepare the children's breakfast: tea, Shreddies, toast & butter. Then I see that Michael is dressed, & bath & dress Clare. Next I take Michael to the{village school}50yds away. I do some housework before going to {Playgroup}at 9.45. I take another Mum in my old Mini to Chorley Village Hall, 3miles away. We open the hall & lock up after the session at midday before driving{home for lunch.
